ContentSnippet.Name: CSS - Global
ContentSnippet.ContentSnippet:
<style>
.update-frame img {
	border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, .5);
}
.page_header{
	height: 80px;
	position: relative;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}
h2.page_title{
	color: #5f5f5f;
	font-size: 1.2em;
	font-style: italic;
	font-weight: normal;
	font-family: Georgia, Times, serif;
	line-height: 16px;
	padding-top: 14px;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
}
p.page_tagline {
	font-family: Georgia, Times, serif;
	font-size: 14px;
	margin-top: -8px;
}
.update-frame{
	width: 202px;
	height: 150px;
	position: relative;
	overflow: hidden;
	margin-right: 38px;
	margin-bottom: 40px;
	float: left;
}
.update-meta{
	background-color: rgb(56, 56, 56);
	background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .8);
	padding: 12px;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: -80px;
	transition: all .4s;
	-webkit-transition: all .4s ease-in-out;
	-moz-transition: all .4s ease-in-out;
	-ms-transition: all .4s ease-in-out;
	-o-transition: all .4s ease-in-out;
	z-index: 1;
}
.update-frame:hover .update-meta{
	bottom: -3px;
}
h3.update-title{
	color: white;
	margin: 0;	padding: 0;
	margin-top: -2px;
	margin-bottom: 6px;
	font-size: 13px;
	height: 16px;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
}
h3.update-title a{
	color: #fff;
	text-decoration: none;
}
h3.update-title a:hover{
	color: #fff;
	text-decoration: underline;
}
p.update-caption {
    color: white;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    font-size: 11px;
    height: 48px;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
}
a.update-href {
    color: #ccc;
    font-style: italic;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 11px;
    line-height: 18px;
}
a.update-href:hover {
    color: #fff;
    text-decoration: underline;
}
.archive {
    width: 720px;
    float: left;
}
ul.related-links {
	padding: 0
}
ul.related-links>li {
    list-style-type: none;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}
ul.related-links a {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #111;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-style: italic;
}
ul.related-links a:hover {
	text-decoration: underline
}
span.make-link {
	position:absolute; 
	width:100%;
	height:100%;
	top:0;
	left: 0;
	z-index: 2;
}
</style>
